andromeda.why: Refuses coerced exertion; power is sovereign, not demanded.

arcturus.why: Begins containment—frames when/where raw power is safe to use.

draco.why: Bulldozing to dominate; loyalty-pressure via force.

orion-dark.why: Power as obedience theater; coercive hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Discipline of restraint—hold strength until the right call.

pleiades.why: Checks impact so others aren’t overrun by intensity.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching power hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Calibrates dosage, timing, and scope—safe channel for power.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint—act only when response is true.

pleiades.why: Attunes to relational safety while engaging force.

sirius.why: Process stewardship, not codified instruction yet.

draco.why: Predatory leveraging of strength for control.

lyra.why: Flash over form—showing power instead of shaping it.

orion-dark.why: Dogmatic use of force to secure obedience.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit excess, refine, re-engage cleanly.

pleiades.why: Appeasement: yielding to pressure to ‘perform’ power.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial-and-error; no law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates sovereignty—power in service to freedom, not display.

arcturus.why: Translates raw strength into protocol—limits, roles, safeguards.

draco.why: Deters predators—strength guards the commons when bounded.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-conduct—demonstrates right use of force under pressure.

pleiades.why: Humane pacing keeps power from overwhelming bonds.

sirius.why: Teaches power protocol—lawful application of strength.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda to ‘be the muscle’ for control agendas.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal fixer/engine—burnout then scapegoat.

draco.why: Status games—who gets to wield the power center.

lyra.why: Iconic presence without theatrics; steadies the field.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture—using strength to enforce orthodoxy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—serve the true response, not applause.

pleiades.why: Appeasing demands to stay ‘available’ for everyone’s needs.

andromeda.why: Frees communities from force-as-default; power serves life.

arcturus.why: Elder standards for lawful force—review, proportionality, restraint.

draco.why: Legacy rank can ossify into gatekeeping of power.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—presence carries strength without display.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing strength into hierarchy rather than service.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—courage to act or not act; power yoked to honor.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of power, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Power sage—teaches the law of right use of force by embodied example.
